title: What are cluster munitions, the widely prohibited weapons Biden is sending to Ukraine?
description: The U.S. is set to supply to Ukraine munitions banned in most countries, amid concerns over the pace of Kyiv's counteroffensive.

title: World shipping body votes on ‘historic’ emissions cuts to curb warming
description: The landmark deal — for a slow-moving, polluting industry resistant to change — includes a pledge to reduce its emission to net-zero “by or about 2050.”

title: U.S. and China struggle to balance security concerns and economic goals
description: Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen met with China’s economic team and heard from the American business community, which has been alarmed by a recent Chinese government actions.

title: Satellite imagery shows evidence of new graves after Tigray massacres
description: An analysis of satellite imagery reveals the growth of established graveyards in the days after hundreds were killed in massacres The Post reported in March.

title: Ukraine live briefing: U.S. to supply Ukraine with cluster munitions; Prigozhin goes to Russia
description: The White House is set to announce a drawdown of the controversial weapons Friday, bypassing a U.S. law that prohibits their use, production or transfer.

title: As Afghan schools remain closed for girls, mental health crisis builds
description: Specialists at hospitals and health center report an increase in women and girls receiving outpatient care and medication.

title: Ukraine wants and expects an invitation to join NATO. Allies are not sure.
description: Kyiv is hoping for a historic decision at the upcoming NATO leaders' summit in Vilnius, Lithuania but may have to settle for interim security guarantees.

title: Once hailed for decriminalizing drugs, Portugal is now having doubts
description: As addiction become more visible in cities like Porto, authorities and citizens groups debate whether to undo Portugal's landmark tolerance for drug use.

title: Biden muddles along with Israel as West Bank violence spirals
description: In the face of violent raids on Jenin and surging settler attacks, the Biden administration is muddling along and doing little to change a dangerous status quo.

title: Macron says social media could be blocked during riots, sparking furor
description: The French president accused social media platforms such as Snapchat, TikTok and Telegram of fueling recent riots over the fatal police shooting of a teenager.

title: U.S. cluster bombs for Ukraine would exceed legal limit on duds
description: The Biden administration appears set to approve controversial munitions as conventional artillery stocks dwindle.
